20110102023045.000|20110102023048.000|CC1|THAT, AND ANGUS T. JONES AS THE

20110102023823.000|20110102023823.000|CC1|DAD ONCE AGAIN.                 
20110102023823.000|20110102023827.000|CC1|>> WHERE'S MY GOOD UNDERWEAR?   
20110102023827.000|20110102023829.000|CC1|>> THE QUESTION IS, WHY ISN'T   
20110102023829.000|20110102023831.000|CC1|ALL YOUR UNDERWEAR GOOD?        
20110102023831.000|20110102023833.000|CC1|>> "MODERN FAMILY" HAS A LITTLE 
20110102023833.000|20110102023833.000|CC1|BIT OF EVERY FAMILY.            
20110102023833.000|20110102023835.000|CC1|IT HAS THE BLENDED FAMILY, THE  
20110102023835.000|20110102023838.000|CC1|OLDER HUSBAND, THE YOUNGER WIFE,
20110102023838.000|20110102023841.000|CC1|IT HAS THE HOMOSEXUAL COUPLE, IT
20110102023841.000|20110102023843.000|CC1|HAS JUST EVERYTHING YOU COULD

20110102023848.000|20110102023850.000|CC1|AND ED O'NEIL.                  
20110102023850.000|20110102023854.000|CC1|>> NOW HE'S OLDER AND HE THINKS,
20110102023854.000|20110102023855.000|CC1|HOPEFULLY, BUT WISER.           
20110102023855.000|20110102023857.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, IT'S ALWAYS A BIT OF A
20110102023857.000|20110102023858.000|CC1|CRAPSHOOT, YOU KNOW?            
20110102023858.000|20110102023902.000|CC1|>> ED O'NEIL WAS BORN IN 1946 IN
20110102023902.000|20110102023904.000|CC1|A FAMOUS STEEL TOWN, YOUNGSTOWN,
20110102023904.000|20110102023904.000|CC1|OHIO.                           
20110102023904.000|20110102023905.000|CC1|HIS FATHER WAS A STEELWORKER AND
